Room.Name: Galgorie Hill
Room.ShortDescription: This is Galgorie Hill, the site of the three day battle between Galgorie and the nameless monster from the pond.
Room.LongDescription: Many were the onlookers that day, as Galgorie fought against the multi-armed monster. At the end of the three days, they saw the monster slide lifeless back into the pond from whence it came. Galgorie lived for another day, cradled in the arms of his beloved. He was buried nearby.
